subject: Re: [sugar] Translations
body:
Marco,

I just added the l10n into spanish for Kuku... as a test in
http://dev.laptop.org/ticket/1847

is that how it should be done?

BTW, any news regarding the site 
http://translate.fedoraproject.org/releases/fedora-7 ?


/X

On Thursday 28 June 2007 05:35, Marco Pesenti Gritti wrote:
MP> Hello,
MP>
MP> I added a page to the wiki with instructions for activity
MP> translations (for both developers and translators).
MP>
MP> http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Activity_Translations
MP>
MP> The process will be refined as the Fedora translations web
MP> site improves but what we have now should be enough to
MP> start.
MP>
MP> Marco
MP> _______________________________________________
MP> Sugar mailing list
MP> Sugar@lists.laptop.org
MP> http://lists.laptop.org/listinfo/sugar
MP>

-- 
XA
